EmailTemplate.subject: Space is Limited. Don’t Be Left on the Ground in 2020
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://www.duncanaviation.aero/]]>
The final countdown for 2020 Mandates compliance has begun, and in many cases if you haven't scheduled your updates by July 2019, you won't get in before the deadline. Don’t put off your upgrades and risk sitting on the ground in 2020, or incurring higher costs. Spirit Aeronautics <[[http://www.spiritaeronautics.com/]]> still has capacity for ADS-B upgrades, but space is limited and filling fast! Click below to contact Spirit Aeronautics today to schedule a time for your upgrade!
UPGRADE NOW <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/ADS-B_Spirit_Aeronautics.html]]>
